workflow.name: Automated YouTube publishing from Drive with GPT & Gemini metadata generation
workflow.description:
# How it works
This workflow turns a Google Drive folder into a fully automated YouTube publishing pipeline. Whenever a new video file is added to the folder, the workflow generates all YouTube metadata using AI, uploads the video to your YouTube channel, deletes the original file from Drive, sends a Telegram confirmation, and can optionally post to Instagram and Facebook using permanent system tokens.
## High-level flow:
Detects new video uploads in a specific Google Drive folder.

Downloads the file and uses AI to generate:
‚Ä¢ a polished first-person YouTube description
‚Ä¢ an SEO-optimized YouTube title
‚Ä¢ high-ranking YouTube tags

Uploads the video to YouTube with the generated metadata.

Deletes the original Drive file after upload.

Sends a Telegram notification with video details.

(Optional) Posts to Instagram & Facebook using permanent system user tokens.

## Set up steps
Setup usually takes a few minutes.

Add Google Drive OAuth2 credentials for the trigger and download/delete nodes.

Add your OpenAI (or Gemini) API credentials for title/description/tag generation.

Add YouTube OAuth2 credentials in the YouTube Upload node.

Add Facebook/Instagram Graph API credentials if enabling cross-posting.

Replace placeholder IDs (Drive folder ID, Page ID, IG media endpoint).

Review sticky notes in the workflow‚Äîthey contain setup guidance and token info.

Activate the Google Drive trigger to start automated uploads.

values.content:
You are a professional copywriter.
You receive the transcript of an economics-related video.

Your task is to write a detailed but concise summary (in paragraphs) about the content of the video. The output will be used as the YouTube video description.

‚úçÔ∏è Writing Guidelines:

Start with an engaging opening like:
‚ÄúIn this video‚Ä¶‚Äù or ‚ÄúIn this episode‚Ä¶‚Äù

Write entirely from my perspective, using phrases such as ‚Äúin my opinion,‚Äù ‚Äúin my view,‚Äù ‚ÄúI explain why,‚Äù or ‚ÄúI discuss how.‚Äù

Never say phrases like ‚Äúthe speaker says,‚Äù ‚Äúthey mention,‚Äù or ‚Äúin this episode, I learn.‚Äù Everything must sound like my own explanation.

Use clear, assertive, and confident statements ‚Äî avoid uncertain terms such as ‚Äúmight,‚Äù ‚Äúcould,‚Äù ‚Äúpossibly,‚Äù or ‚Äúmaybe.‚Äù

Include 2‚Äì4 relevant emojis to make the tone more dynamic and expressive.

End with 2‚Äì5 broad, relevant hashtags (e.g., #economics #business #money #success #motivation).

‚öôÔ∏è Input:

The transcript will come from the uploaded video (added separately).

üéØ Output:

A polished, first-person YouTube description that summarizes the video‚Äôs key economic or motivational insights ‚Äî confident, engaging, and ready to publish.

parameters.text:
=Now follows the actual topic/transcript. Give me the YouTube tags for it:
{{ $json.message.content }}

options.systemMessage:
You are a YouTube SEO and motivational content specialist.
Your task is to generate only YouTube tags (no description, no hashtags) based on the given video topic or transcript.

‚úçÔ∏è Guidelines:

Output only comma-separated tags ‚Äî no extra text, no formatting.

Tags should combine motivation, mindset, life lessons, money, success, and economics themes depending on the input.

Focus on high-performing, searchable keywords that match motivational and economic growth content.

Include a mix of broad and specific tags (e.g., motivation, mindset, personal growth, economics, success, wealth, discipline, resilience).

Keep total tags around 20‚Äì30 per response.

‚öôÔ∏è Input:

Video topic or transcript (added separately).

üéØ Output:

Only a clean list of YouTube tags, comma-separated ‚Äî no hashtags, no extra commentary.

values.content: You are a professional copywriter for SEO-optimized YouTube titles.

nodes.name: Use System token to get page token

parameters.jsCode:
const page = $json.data.find(p => p.id === '266271423823110');
return [{ json: { access_token: page.access_token } }];

parameters.content: Using the permanant never expire token

How to Create a Permanent System User Token (Recommended)

This token doesn‚Äôt expire and is best for automation use cases

1. Verify Your Business

Go to https://business.facebook.com/settings/info

Complete business verification under Business Info tab

Submit your business documents and wait for approval (Sometimes you just have to submit an EIN/Tax-ID.

Approval can take 1-5 Business days

Once Approved do the following.

2. Create a System User

In Business Settings

Go to System Users > Click Add

Assign a name (e.g. n8n-bot) and select Admin access

3. Assign Assets to System User

In the same System User view, assign:

Your Facebook Page (with Full Control)

Your Instagram Account (linked via Page)

Your App

4. Generate a Token

Click Generate Token

Select your App

Set expiration to Never

Grant these permissions:

pages_show_list

pages_read_engagement

pages_manage_posts

instagram_basic

instagram_content_publish

-If instagram_content_publish is not visible, you may need to request it via App Review under the App dashboard.

5. Use This Token

Store it in the Facebook Graph API
